contexts.context: ...American Antarctic explorer. Participated in all 5 expeditions <mark>conducted</mark> by Admiral Byrd.
...American naval officer and Antarctic explorer. Admiral Byrd <mark>conducted</mark> 5 Antarctic expeditions between 1928 and 1956.
